text: dramatic scenes here in the last hour or
so are the talks which have been going
on between the political parties and the
various demonstrating groups here in
Bangkok came to an end in what were
fairly chaotic the scenes as the
military tried to exert their control
over this compound blocking various
entries and exits the protest leaders
were taken away in mini buses surrounded
by soldiers we it's not entirely clear
where they've gone at that stage it was
it was chaos we knew that something had
happened but it wasn't clear quite what
and then the announcement came on Thai
television across all the free-to-air
channels here that the army had taken
full control of power here we'd been
expecting this perhaps over the last
couple of days but with this process of
talks in place that perhaps a surprise
that it happened so soon
